tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GMO_Licensing (
    license_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id UUID NOT NULL,
    licensee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    licensing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE,
    licensed_region VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    contact_person_name VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE licensing (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    license_holder VARCHAR(100),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(50),
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    inventor VARCHAR(100),
    filing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Licensing (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_id INT,
    licensee_name VARCHAR(255),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_name VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    filed_date DATE,
    inventors VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Companies (
    company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Researchers (
    researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255),
    affiliation VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE LicensingHistory (
    license_id INT,
    company_id INT,
    license_type VARCHAR(100),
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);
